External SVG as icon.

```yaml preview
brick: eo-svg-icon
properties:
  imgSrc: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/lucide-static@0.16.29/icons/pie-chart.svg"
  style:
    fontSize: 32px
    color: var(--palette-green-6)
```

## Examples

### SvgContent

```yaml preview
- brick: h2
  properties:
    textContent: 预览 SVG 图标
- brick: p
  properties:
    textContent: 选择一张 SVG 图片，并预览它生成的图标。注意在右上角切换主题模式，以便验证其在深色和浅色主题下都能按预期显示。
- brick: eo-upload-file
  properties:
    style:
      width: 300px
    uploadDraggable: true
    accept: image/svg+xml
    draggableUploadTip: 选择一张 SVG 图片
  events:
    change:
      - if: <% EVENT.detail?.length %>
        useProvider: basic.set-timeout
        args:
          - 0
          - <% EVENT.detail[EVENT.detail.length - 1].file.text() %>
        callback:
          success:
            target: eo-svg-icon
            properties:
              svgContent: <% EVENT.detail %>
- brick: eo-svg-icon
  properties:
    svgContent: |
```
